name: Genesis (itch) (User0x7f)
description:
The year is 2120, Earth has been attacked by an evil AI.
One single fighter has broken through the ferocious siege, fight your way through hordes of enemies to reach the main processor of Genesis and destroy it. The future of mankind depends on you...
Fight your way through 4 action packed levels, collect shields, energy, and power-ups from enemy remains and test your agility to dodge enemy fire, to reach the boss fight at the end of each level.
Can you overcome the evil invasion of GENESIS?
Controls:
D-Pad / Arrow keys = Move
A = Shoot (can be held down for auto fire)B = NukeStart / Enter = Start Game / Pause
Order the game on the Incube8 Games website by clicking the link below:
https://incube8games.com/products/genesis-gb
